header.title: Staff Software Engineer | Tech Lead | Blogger

summary: A Tech Lead and Technical Project Manager who played a crucial role in designing, leading the development, and delivering the Data Loading services from scratch, contributing to the successful launch of ByteHouse, a Cloud Data Warehouse.
A TDD, BDD and DDD practitioner who writes highly maintainable and well-tested code. He has hands-on experience across diverse domains.
An effective communicator, adept at articulating technical complexities to cross-functional stakeholders.

A tech blogger who is actively spreading a culture of engineering excellence. His posts cover various topics including REST API, Clean Code, Concurrency and Microservices (15,000+ monthly impressions on LinkedIn).
